_comment: Manifest file used for creating review apps
name: Calchart
description: A website used to make shows for the University of California Marching Band
_comment: all environment variables should be inherited from the parent app, calchart-staging

AWS_ACCESS_KEY.description: The access key for our Amazon AWS bucket.

AWS_SECRET_KEY.description: The secret key for our Amazon AWS bucket.

AWS_BUCKET_REVIEW.description: The bucket name for the static files for the staging app.

MEMBERS_ONLY_STAGING.description: The presence of this environment variable signifies that we're on a staging app.

MEMBERS_ONLY_SECRET_KEY.description: The secret key used by Django.

DISABLE_COLLECTSTATIC.description: Use our own collectstatic command in the post_compile hook

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Stores the name of this application on Heroku.
